name: GeneMaze
description:
Mostly a filler project while I work on something better. All levels were generated using a maze gen algorithm

Oh no! You magically and nonsensically teleported into a maze of horrors! Luckily, you happened to accidentally slice your feet open minutes prior, and a trail of blood is being left in your wake! Use it to your advantage!

Arrow keys to move/look

MAPS (P=Player, T=Target):
